textbooks.title: Discovering Knowledge in Data: An introduction to Data Mining
textbooks.author: Daniel T. Larose

textbooks.title: Data Mining and Analysis: Foundations and Algorithms
textbooks.author: Mohammed J. Zaki and Wagner Meira, Jr

topics: What is Data Analytics & Machine Learning?
The Six Phases of Data Science & ML: An End-to-End Approach
Data Transformation: Min-Max Normalization; Z-Score Standardization
k-Nearest Neighbor Algorithm for estimation and prediction
Comparison of the C4.5 and CART Algorithms Applied to Real Data
Neural Network for Estimation and Prediction
Real World Projects and Case Study
Applications of k-Means Clustering Using SAS Enterprise Miner

policies.academic_integrity: Cheating during in-class tests or take-home examinations or homework is illegal and immoral. Consequences of academic impropriety are severe.

additional_info.course_format: Lectures, class discussion, individual and team assignments, individual and team homework and projects.

instructor.name: Mahmoud Daneshmand, PhD
instructor.office_hours: Tuesdays 2-3 PM, Thursdays 2-3 PM, Wednesdays 5-6 PM

_metadata.course_description: This course will focus on Data Analytics and Machine Learning Algorithms as well as their applications in solving real world Scientific, Business and Operation problems.
learning_outcomes: Recognize, define, describe, and clearly state the objectives of Knowledge Discovery using Data Analytics and Machine Learning algorithms.
Identify relevant data and corresponding Databases, data Warehouses, and data sources from which Knowledge can be extracted.
Specify how to access the relevant data.
Preprocess the data (Clean, Integrate, and Transform).
Determine proper algorithm(s) and discovery model(s) & technologies.
Decide on up-to-date software packages to execute specified algorithms/ techniques.
Executive & and Discover: patterns, dependencies that will enable predictions; extract Nuggets of knowledge; make intelligent Scientific, business, and operation decisions.
Input the extracted knowledge to the next iterative steps.
Demonstrate that your skilled as being a Data Scientist capable of executing an end to end Data Analytics and Machine Learning Project.
prerequisites: Student is expected to be familiar with calculus, elementary probability & statistics.
